Posts.Content: hello I went through Chemo treatments April - June of 2003 and Find out that I still stay tired . Is that normal . I take walks but it seems like I do not have any energy what so ever. Does any one have these problems at all. marilyn
Posts.Title: Re; still stay tired is that normal

Posts.Content: After the Hollidays I find out that I still get worn out very easy . I break down and cry very easy also because I'm tired is that normal .Right now I feel like my throat is trying to get sore and it is. My last Chemo Treatment was June the 10th of 2003 and I shouldn't be tired .Why am I so tired? It is not fair to any one that I get tired so easy and break down and cry . Marilyn
Posts.Title: Hello I still find out especially after the Holidays that I still get tired very easy and worn out .

Posts.Content: I had cancer 13yrs ago and went through a total of 6 months of chemo treatments and a new breastcancer last year and a total of 4 chemo treatments and my eyesight has changed has any one else noticed a change in eyesight due to chemo treatments . I'm trying to find out if chemotreatments affects changes in eyesight but I don't know what to look under or where to look for my answer. Marilyn
Posts.Title: Has anyone noticed a change in their eye sight

Posts.Content: After chemotreatments hair comes back different. I bet your hair is very soft also . My hair is very soft and starting to curl in the back. Mine came back the same color . A friend of mine from church she and I went through the exact same chemo treatments her hair came back very curly. My stepmom had a friend that went through chemo treatments and her friends hair came back dark and curly. It is the chemo that does that. Marilyn
Posts.Title: Hair Help...

Posts.Content: Hello my Chemo Doctor said for me to exersize well I have been taking Copper and Roxie for 1 and 3/4 mile walk and still tires me out and I cant tell any difference at all because I still feel tired .Does any one feel tired after they walk or exersize also or is it just in my mind. I'm Trying to exersize like my doctor told me to. marilyn
Posts.Title: Take Dogs for a walk and Still

Posts.Content: Has any one had their portacatheter taken out if so did it hurt after wards .I'm getting mine taken out on Friday the 2nd of April .I will feel good about it because I will know when I get it out that my cancer is behind me. And also does any one have problems with facial hair if so what do you do about it. I still find out that I tire out very easy is that still normal my cancer surgery was Feb.of last year and my chemo treatments ended in June of last year. Marilyn
